"""
The abstract Uncertainty Problem pluggable component.
"""

from abc import ABC
from qiskit_aqua import Pluggable
from qiskit_aqua.utils import CircuitFactory



[docs]class UncertaintyProblem(CircuitFactory, Pluggable, ABC):
    """
    The abstract Uncertainty Problem pluggable component.
    """


[docs]    @classmethod
    def init_params(cls, params):
        args = {k: v for k, v in params.items() if k != 'name'}
        return cls(**args)


    def __init__(self, num_qubits):
        super().__init__(num_qubits)


[docs]    def value_to_estimation(self, value):
        return value
